SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Calculations based on product sheets from Cisco, software costs from product websites and Marketshare Data from Industry sources (IDC)
Assumptions: System supports 6 users - We estimate that for every $ spent on Videoconferencing equipment, roughly 2$ are spent on a one-time network upgrade and installation charges Reference: http://www.ivci.com/pdf/video-conferencing-telepresence-market-forecast.pdf
